data.text:

You agree that if you are contracting this service on behalf of a legal entity or group, you have been given the permission and rights by this legal entity or group to agree these terms and conditions. This Application is the management web interface whereby you manage your subscription and your end users (“Authorized Users”) use of the Application. You hereby acknowledge that this Agreement covers you and your Authorized Users’ use of this Application and mobile applications. You agree that you will protect your password of your account from any unauthorized use.

Important notice:

Please read this Agreement carefully before downloading the Application. It is a binding contract between you and SmarTone. By downloading the Application you accept and fully agree to be bound by all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. By using the Application you consent to us collecting and using technical information about your Authorized User’s device(s) and related software, hardware and peripherals for services that are Network-based or wireless to improve our products and provide any services to you.

You warrant that such information about Authorized Users is accurate and complete.

You acknowledge that we may monitor and audit your use of the Application at any time, including the number of Authorized Users.

7.4 BILLING AND PAYMENT

Fees in respect of the Application must be paid in advance for the Subscription Period and for a specified number of Authorized Users. The purchase is final and non-refundable., except where we choose to terminate the Agreement in accordance with clause 9.3.

During the Subscription Term you may permit additional Authorized Users to download and use the Application and subject to payment of the applicable Fee for such additional Authorized Users prior to any download or use being permitted.

All payments due are in Hong Kong dollars. Upon signing the Agreement, the Customer shall pay the Monthly Service Fee for the above Service Period. The Company shall be entitled to charge interest at the rate of two percent (2%) per month on any overdue amount from the due date until the date on which payment in full is received by the Company. Such interest shall accrue from day to day. Monthly Service Fee shall be payable in advance on a monthly basis. All payment made shall be non-refundable and non-transferable.

All Fees are payable immediately on the due date. If we have not received payment within 30 day after the due date, and without prejudice to any of our other rights and remedies:
